item.title: The GOP Establishment Is a Cancer on America
item.description: Former Florida governor Jeb Bush, appearing Thursday on ABC’s “Good Morning America,” said that “of course” he would back Trump, should he emerge triumphant at next year’s GOP convention in Cleveland. “We need to be unified, we need to win,” Bush said. –The Washington Post, September 3, 2015 The Republican Establishment has exposed itself as a political disease willing to kill its host. Unless we seek treatment and remove the tumor first.
